> someone and a pic of Saito and Okita:

>

> This one is a PeaceMaker fanart that is bound to make you giggle!

>

and
> Okita:

>

fanarts.
> The first one is a very nice Okita pic. The second is Hijikata in

Woah... Thanks MissBehavin... Looks like I've got to work on these
too... Ah well another batch of permission e-mails will be sent out
on Monday with regards to fanart....

Anyway, I got an overwhelming positive replys on the fanfiction area
so that was great. Now just have to finish that part this weekend...

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] Fanart sightings
messages.msgSnippet: Whoa! That s a heck of a load of fanart! I m watching the japanese news on Scola to see if they don t show the Kyoto Shinsengumi parade ^.- I ve never seen
messages.messageBody:
Whoa! That's a heck of a load of fanart! I'm watching the japanese news on Scola to see if they don't show the Kyoto Shinsengumi parade ^.- I've never seen sooo much Shinsengumi fanart! usually it's just kenshin. Thanks! I like to see other people draw SG stuff. It inspires me.


---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Friends. Fun. Try the all-new Yahoo! Messenger

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Fanart sightings
messages.msgSnippet: I spotted some Shinsengumi fanart here and there on the web last night and thought I d pass the links on. I especially like the first pics of Hijikata. Big
messages.messageBody:
I spotted some Shinsengumi fanart here and there on the web last
night and thought I'd pass the links on. I especially like the first
pics of Hijikata. Big surprise that Hijikata pics would be my favs,
huh? Can't recall if any of this has been mentioned here before.

These first two are of Hijikata. I'm not sure if this is original
artwork or if it's from a manga I'm unfamiliar with:

http://www.angelfire.com/anime2/shinsengumi/kiri_hizi.jpg

htpp://www.angelfire.com/anime2/shinsengumi/ki_toshi.jpg

If those links don't work, then go
http://www.angelfire.com/anime2/shinsengumi/hijikata_sama.html and
there will be a section at the bottom about the fanart.

The next site had a rather cool pic of RK Saito about to Gatotsu
someone and a pic of Saito and Okita:

http://www.fanimenation.com/Detailed/5937.html

http://www.fanimenation.com/Detailed/6693.html


This one is a PeaceMaker fanart that is bound to make you giggle!

http://crimson-blue.org/afternoon.jpg

I posted about this one on the message board also. It's of Harada and
Okita:

http://www.fanart-central.net/pictures.php?pid=56960


And finally, these two were on MediaMiner and are PeaceMaker fanarts.
The first one is a very nice Okita pic. The second is Hijikata in
bunny ears. 'Nuff said.

http://www.mediaminer.org/fanart/view.php/161466

http://www.mediaminer.org/fanart/view.php/161611



-MissBehavin
